greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of (1-x)/(1-x+x^3).
link: G. C. Greubel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..1000
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (1,0,-1).
formula: a(n+1) = a(n) - a(n-2), a(0)=1, a(1)=a(2)=0. - _Philippe Deléham_, Nov 12 2011
G.f.: 1 - x^3 - x^4 + x^6 + x^6/(G(0) - 1) where G(k) = 1 - x*(k+1)/(1 - x/(x - (k+1)/G(k+1) )); (recursively defined continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Dec 17 2012
mathematica: LinearRecurrence[{1,0,-1}, {1,0,0}, 70] (* or *) CoefficientList[Series[ (1-x)/(1-x+x^3), {x,0,70}], x] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 29 2019 *)
program: (GAP) a:=[1,0,0];; for n in [4..70] do a[n]:=a[n-1]-a[n-3]; od; a; # _G. C. Greubel_, Jun 29 2019
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Nov 17 2002
